title: Pinocchio, Part 3
subtle: Fairy Tale (fiction), 1,225 words, Level T (Grade 3), Lexile 710L
description: In Pinocchio, Part 3, Pinocchio and his friend Candlewick decide to skip school and head to the Land of Toys. They have a great time there, playing and riding bicycles and not doing any work ... until the day they turn into donkeys! After that, Pinocchio goes on a journey that will eventually lead him right back where he belongs. Colorful illustrations and an engaging storyline will keep students interested in this story to the very end. The book can also be used to teach students how to determine cause-and-effect relationships as well as how to make, revise, and confirm predictions to better understand a text.
